sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of natural disaster occurring in a region
message_1: What is the probability that a region will experience a tornado in any given year, given that the historical data shows that there is a 0.5% chance of a tornado occurrence per year?
message_2: The probability that a region will experience a tornado in any given year, based on the historical data provided, is 0.5% or 0.005 in decimal form.
